## Related Works

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
source("R/common.R")
source("R/latex.R")
source("R/kable.R")
LoadPackage("tidyverse")
LoadPackage("kableExtra")
LoadPackage("ggpubr")
LoadPackage("ggplot2")
```

### v1

```{r}
relatedWorks <- read.csv2("csv/related-works.csv")
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
CreateScrollableTable(t(relatedWorks))
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
SaveLatexTable(t(relatedWorks), "Comparision of existing solutions and PULCEO.", "comparison-of-existing-solutions-and-pulceo", "comparison-of-existing-solutions-and-pulceo.tex", "tb", "table")
```

### v2

```{r}
relatedWorks_v2 <- read.csv2("csv/related-works-v2.csv")
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
CreateScrollableTable(t(relatedWorks_v2))
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
SaveLatexTable(relatedWorks_v2, "Comparision of existing solutions and PULCEO - v2.", "comparison-of-existing-solutions-and-pulceo-v2", "comparison-of-existing-solutions-and-pulceo-v2.tex", "tb", "table")
```
